verse.roman:
namas tasmai bhagavate
kṛṣṇāyādbhuta-karmaṇe
anantāyādi-bhūtāya
kūṭa-sthāyātmane namaḥ

synonyms: namaḥ—obeisances; tasmai—to Him; bhagavate—the Supreme Lord; kṛṣṇāya—Kṛṣṇa; adbhuta—amazing; karmaṇe—whose acts; anantāya—the unlimited; ādi-bhūtāya—the source of all existence; kūṭa-sthāya—the immovable center of existence; ātmane—the Supreme Soul; namaḥ—obeisances.
translation: "I offer my obeisances to that Supreme Personality of Godhead, Kṛṣṇa, whose every deed is amazing. He is the Supreme Soul, the unlimited source and fixed center of all existence."
